Title: Requires cell towers to be equipped with a back-up power source in case of a power outage
Summary: Requires cell towers to be equipped with a back-up power source in case of a power outage.
LawCode: Add ยง399-yyyyy, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to requiring cell towers to be equipped with a back-up power source in case of a power outage
